artist.artistInfo: Navid Modiri & Gudarna är en musikgrupp med radioprataren och artisten Navid Modiri som förman.

Kevin James is a devotional singer, Shakuhachi flute player, and chant leader from Australia. He travels the world in the spirit of Oneness, with his wife Susana, going where the invitation and heart lead, sharing ancient mantras and chants from various traditions with his own prayers and Heartsongs.

concert.concertInfo: Enjoy an evening of connection and community spirit, singing Heartsongs and Mantras.

artist.artistInfo: Based in the county of Dalarna, Sweden, Fia Forsström (known mononymously as Fia) is a spiritual singer/songwriter who with her inspirational lyrics and catchy melodies has a unique way of weaving music that empowers the listener to drop deeper into themselves and find their own medicine.

concert.concertInfo: Their next tour date in Sweden is at Eric Ericssonhallen.

artist.artistInfo: The most popular band in the WORLD!!!!

concert.concertInfo: Nessi är tillbaka för att beröra oss med sin Fado-folkmusik med brittisk progressiv modern inspiration.

artist.artistInfo: Thomas Di Leva är en svensk sångare, låtskrivare och skådespelare.

concert.concertInfo: Thomas Di Leva fortsätter med sin kritikerrosade David Bowie-turné “Changes” under hösten 2022 och våren 2023.

artist.artistInfo: Dungen är ett svenskt rockband bildat 1999 och baserat i Stockholm.
Tame Impala is the psychedelic music project of Australian multi-instrumentalist Kevin Parker.
